resources.string: The QR code is invalid; are you sure that you\'re taking a picture at the right display?
Generating unique code for pairing this device…

Type this code in the Chrome Extension's text field:

%1$s

Code is case-sensitive (upper/lower case does matter!)
Couldn\'t generate an ID for this device using the QR code.\n\nPlease refresh the Chrome Extension\'s configuration page and try again.
To send messages through Whatsapp, Whatsapp needs to be installed!
%1$s has been successfully paired!\n\nYou can now use WhatsHare to share content from your %1$s through Whatsapp!
Couldn\'t pair devices, try to take another picture of the QR code in a few seconds!
Take a picture of the QR code displayed by the other device\'s WhatsHare app (or by the Chrome Extension)
Scan this QR code with the other Android device (where Whatsapp is installed).\n Then, type in the resulting code.

Scan this QR code with the other Android device (where Whatsapp is installed).
 Then, type in the resulting code.

 WARNING! Pairing a new device will unpair %1$s
You need to pair an Android device first where Whatsapp is installed
Remove %1$s from the list of paired devices?\n\nThis will make Whatshare ignore all messages coming from %1$s
Unpair %1$s?\n\nYou won\'t be able to share content using %1$s\'s Whatsapp until you pair it again
Choose an ID for the device
must be at least 1 character long
